Abstract: This evaluation was carried out to assist USOM/Pakistan and strengthen its training program.  The study involved data collected from a structured questionnaire with 234 returned participants and oral interviews with a sample of this group. Recommendations are general and of a more philosophical nature in the areas of training design, pre-departure, follow-up, and participant utilization of training. (Participant training abstract)
Title: Technical training of Pakistanis in US : an evaluation of the I.C.A. program 1951-1955
Evaluation of the malaria control program sponsored by the Governments of Liberia and the United States
